name: In The Rain
description:
A horror twine game about wanting to get forward in life, but it's raining really hard, and you're unsure if the bus is ever going to come. 

This is just a simple short story I wanted to put into Twine. It's a horror story, but it doesn't have any ridiculously scary things about it. No jumpscares, not much atmosphere really. (I might update it to add some music someday, but for now it's just kind of a silent Twine Game. )

It's a bit over 900-words, so if you just wanted something quick to read, here you go.
